name: Tanks Fire: Armed Force 3D
description:
Can you hear the thunder of cannon? Enemy army is coming! Prepare to protect yourself and your soldiers and take part in epic tank battle!

HOW TO PLAY: Use the virtual joystick on the screen to control your tank and the weapon button to shoot. Aim at enemy tanks and dodge their bombs. Health indicators will help you to estimate your and opponents' power.

Tanks Fire - Armed Force game features:
- Tank battle simulator in 3D;
- Nostalgic old school tank game;
- Smooth controlling and animation;
- Realistic cool shooting sounds.

Jump into your tank and forget your prior peaceful life - now it's war age!
